description: This file defines a Feign client interface for communicating with a core banking service, including methods to read account details and perform utility payments.

classes.name: BankingCoreRestClient
classes.description: A REST client interface that provides methods to interact with core banking functionalities such as reading account details and executing utility payments.

methods.name: readAccount
methods.description: Retrieves account information for a specified account number from the core banking service.

methods.name: utilityPayment
methods.description: Initiates a utility payment transaction through the core banking service using the provided payment request data.
